SportsPay (https://sportspayhq.com) | Software Engineer | Pasadena, CA | Full-time , On-site

We help youth sports organizations collect money efficiently from parents so coaches can coach and players can play. Our web app adds useful workflow on top of payment processing to save teams a ton of time and money.

We are funded, revenue positive and scaling our product and customer base.

We're looking for a software engineer with an ownership mentality who is willing to own the full stack from development to deployment and testing: Python/Flask, HTML/CSS/JS, PostgreSQL, Heroku, TravisCI, Github. Bonus points for candidates who have been technical co-founders or taken a lead technical role in early stage startups in the past.

Interested? jobs@sportspayhq.com
